revised_title: Coupling Problem for U(p, q) Ladder Representations: Limitations on Coupling of U(p, q) Ladders
tldr: The authors analyze the possibility of constructing a Yukawa-type interaction with a baryon, an antibaryon, and a meson multiplet invariant under the group. They show that the tensor product of two ladders does not contain any ladder, making it impossible to construct an invariant Yukawa-type interaction term.
